# Bad pixel coordinates:
#   For RED array
#   Based on Lab measurements in 2017
#
# column 1: spaxel number (1-25, numbered left to right in array)
# column 2: spexel number (1-16, numbered bottom to top in array)
 2   1 
 2  16
 3   7
 9  16
16   9
16  13
17   4 
18  10 
18  11 
18  13 
21   3 
23   9
24  15
